FuncDef: This command configures the Local Management Interface (LMI) type for Frame Relay interfaces. LMIs are sets of enhancements to the basic Frame Relay specification.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to use ANSI T1.617 Annex D.
Specifies to use ITU-T Q933 Annex A.
Specifies to disable Frame Relay LMI on the given port/channel.
Specifies to use the Rev 1 version of ANSI T1.617 Annex D.
